name: Cold Feet
description:
Made for the Winter GameJam, where the theme was "cold". This is my first ever game I have released, hence some of the artwork/animations are very simple. I am definitely still learning in that department! Made with Unity, this is a simple but fun side-scrolling platformer where the objective is just to survive from: freezing, or falling to death.

CONTROLS
LMB = Jump
LMB x2 = Double Jump
RMB = Break Free
